meanings.definition: Not biting or causing harm with teeth.
meanings.sent1: The nonbiting puppy licked my hand gently.
meanings.sent2: She preferred nonbiting insects in her garden to avoid any harm.
meanings.sent3: The nonbiting mosquito decided to throw a party instead of biting anyone.
meanings.sent4: His nonbiting remarks were like a soothing balm to her wounded feelings.
meanings.sent5: The nonbiting sun warmed their skin without any harshness.

meanings.sent1: The nonbiting flutterby landed gracefully on the flower.
meanings.sent2: We marveled at the beauty of the nonbiting creatures in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The nonbiting bug told jokes to entertain the other insects.
meanings.sent4: The nonbiting insect was a symbol of peace in the garden.
meanings.sent5: Children loved to watch the nonbiting insects play in the grass.
